title: Ugly Family Members, Friends with Benefits, Right or Wrong, Tommy's Midshow Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Ugly Family Members, Friends with Benefits, Right or Wrong, Tommy's Midshow Remarks and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We is who we is. The Baddest Morning Show in the Land. Championship Team!!! Big ups to our Fearless Leader Steve Harvey. The Champ is here!!! Junior talks about ugliness in families. The fellas give us the rules and regulations of a friends with benefits arrangement. Do you know anyone that can go 0 to 60? Steve does some commentary over As We Lay by Shirley Murdock. Steve's behavior has raised some concerns with the crew. we have the return of Right or Wrong. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about being tested, plus so much more. Have a great weekend!!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
